NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Waste Management and Emissions or the cell corresponding to Oil and Reliability?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Oil} and {Reliability} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Waste Management and Efficiency or the cell corresponding to Water and Production?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Water} and {Production} has a higher heat value.

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.28 to 0.39?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Waste Management, Consumption), (Waste Management, Efficiency), (Water, Efficiency), (Water, Emissions), (Electricity, Production), (Electricity, Reliability), (Exploration, Reliability), (Exploration, Technology)}.
